title: LILLUSORY Womens Summer Casual Slip Dresses Spaghetti Strap Bodycon Maxi Dress
description: Soft, buttery soft fabric, stretchy and with skinny straps, this dress will be flattering for any body figure!
Pair it with heels for an elegant look, or dress it down with sandals or sneakers for a beachy, relaxed vibe.
This maxi dress is an effortlessly easy wardrobe staple perfect for every season. Perfect for party, wedding guest, homecoming, club, going out, beach, graduation.
Size: Please Refer To Size Chart For Details Before Purchase Which We Provide In Our Pictures
MACHINE WASH COLD, TUMBLE DRY LOW: we recommend machine washing with laundry bag on cold.
